animeTitle: Bokutachi wa Benkyou ga Dekinai: Nagisa ni Usemono Arite Senjin wa Enzen to [X] Suru
animeDescription: Bundled with the limited edition volume 14.   The episode adapts chapters 48 and 49, which follow Yuiga and Asami going on a fake date, and Yuiga encountering his teacher Mafuyu Kirisu after she accidentally loses her swimsuit top.  (Source: MAL News)
animeCharacters: ['Furuhashi, Fumino', 'Kirisu, Mafuyu', 'Takemoto, Uruka', 'Ogata, Rizu', 'Kominami, Asumi', 'Yuiga, Nariyuki', 'Sekijou, Sawako', 'Yuiga, Mizuki', 'Mikuni', 'Shopkeeper']
animeVoices: ['Shiraishi, Haruka', 'Lynn', 'Suzushiro, Sayumi', 'Tomita, Miyu', 'Asahina, Madoka', 'Oosaka, Ryouta', 'Oonishi, Saori', 'Kouno, Marika', 'Tanezaki, Atsumi']
